dcterms:creator: T. Huber
M. Demmler
S. Mertes
M. L. Olson
E. André
dcterms:description: A simple 5 × 5 grid world, where the agent is tasked with shooting the dragon. The agent must be in the same file or row as the dragon, and the space between them must be empty to successfully perform the SHOOT action.
dcterms:title: Stochastic GridWorld

dcterms:creator: T. Huber
M. Demmler
S. Mertes
M. L. Olson
E. André
dcterms:description: A well-known stochastic grid world environment where the agent is tasked with reaching the goal while navigating a grid with some squares covered in ice. Actions can lead to desired states or leave the agent in the same state with some probability.
dcterms:title: Frozen Lake
